Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets.

FAQ:

â™¡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these hallsâ™¡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4930170,"totalDownVotes":423753,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":12126,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5212858,"creatorName":"Vows by the Sea","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":105212,"totalDownVotes":11123,"universeId":1359573625,"name":"Deepwoken","placeId":4111023553,"playerCount":5311,"imageToken":"T_4111023553_ec2b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":400,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":">> Deepwoken is a difficult game with permanent character loss. Losing characters is a part of the game that should be expected. <<

Seek out your destiny upon an unforgiving sea and unravel the mysteries of a dying world. Discover and modify powerful abilities, find unique strengths, and develop your character into a force to be reckoned with. Desperately try to escape the horrors that lurk just beneath the waves. Whatever you do, it's your story to be told.

Developed by: Ragoozer, Arch_Mage, Melon_Sensei, Dexerius, Grimmkind
Built by: Zartania, melonbeard
Composed by: Naktigonis
Contributions from: Snakeworl (Scripting), yayafino (Scripting), iVenatrix (Scripting), EstheKing (Modelling), HorrorTM (Modelling), minkle (Modelling), Konrekhelm (Modelling), Zintenka (Modelling), Chicken_Man (Ships), KAHAEL (Clothing), Rengi (Clothing)

The full list of contributors is listed in the Credits screen, check out their work!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4294803,"creatorName":"Fireheart Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":395493,"totalDownVotes":59139,"universeId":1650291138,"name":"Demonfall [2.9!]","placeId":4855457388,"playerCount":5856,"imageToken":"T_4855457388_e0ab","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Demonfall is based on the popular series Demon Slayer.

Ascend the hill with the power of humanity on your shoulder, and fight for survival along with your comrades; or head down the ravine to lose ones humanity, and live as a demon with unholy powers.
Fight, explore, learn, grow, eat, all common necessities and virtues of one, despite your path, in this world, its the survival of the fittest.

[Controls]
R - Unsheathe Sword
Tab - Menu Toggle Tab --> Configuration = Reset
M - Meditate [Skill Tree]
H - Toggle Emotes
Sprint + M1 - Lunge
Block + M1 - Shoulder Bash
C -
